subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Orthwein, an advertising executive and investor, was a former owner of the New England Patriots and played a role in the Rams’ move from Los Angeles to St. Louis.
snippet: Mr. Orthwein, an advertising executive and investor, was a former owner of the New England Patriots and played a role in the Rams’ move from Los Angeles to St. Louis.
